Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
  GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Camera, Player
public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object

GameObject is the superclass for all the objects in the game that need a location.

Used mostly as a convenience superclass, it helps to avoid tedious retyping of the get and set methods for the location variables. This class should be inhereted by all objects having at least a position.

Author:
Bruno Scheele
